title: an error occurred when extract the source tar file
body:
by **lifephp**: 
I download go1.0.3.linux-386.tar.gz in http://code.google.com/p/go/downloads/list, but
when I extract it, it has  encounter an error:

gzip: stdin: invalid compressed data--crc error
tar: Child returned status 1
tar: Exiting with failure status due to previous errors

I don't know whether you have tar the source code well or not. And I check the other tar
file in the download list has the same problem too.

Or maybe my network is not well.
